segments.text: May I be of any help ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . Show me the sweaters , please .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , could you bring me all the styles of pullovers ? I am not quite sure which one I will buy .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Ok . Here are the ones , turtleneck pullover , crewneck pullover , V-neck pullover and cowl-neck pullover .
segments.speaker: S1
